alert.note: Alert for Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 12:44PM MST until March 10 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches in the mountains above 6500 feet MSL and 1 to 4 inches in the valleys below where snow may mix with rain at times. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, particularly Friday afternoon. * WHERE...Challis and Pahsimeroi Valley. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
